sentences.en: Cambrian stratigraphy well developed in Luxi ( west of Shandong ), and their sedimentary records possesses cyclicity.
sentences.cn: 鲁西地区寒武纪地层发育较好, 沉积记录具旋回性的特点.

sentences.en: Coal geology emphatically studies always stratigraphy and sedimentology of coal and coal - bearing strata.
sentences.cn: 煤地质学一直偏重于对煤和含煤地层的地层学和沉积学的研究.

sentences.en: From the view of stratigraphy, they all belong to the Cretaceous period.
sentences.cn: 从地层学上看, 它们都属于白垩纪.

sentences.en: High - resolution sequence stratigraphy overcomes the fault of diachroneity in lithostratigraphic correlation.
sentences.cn: 高分辨率 层序地层学克服了岩性地层对比穿时的缺点.

sentences.en: It is much more complex and difficult to study Archean stratigraphy than Phanerozoic stratigra - phy.
sentences.cn: 太古宙地层与显生宙地层相比,具有很大的复杂性,研究难度大.

sentences.en: Palaeobiology and Stratigraphy is one of the most important curriculums in Earth Science.
sentences.cn: 《古生物学与地层学》是地球科学各专业最重要的基础课程之一.

sentences.en: Quantitative simulation of stratigraphy in a basin is an important component of sedimentary basins modelling.
sentences.cn: 地层定量模拟是沉积盆地模拟的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Research of sequence stratigraphy in nonmarine petroliferous basin must introduce some new concepts.
sentences.cn: 陆相含油气盆地中层序地层学的研究不同于海相盆地.

sentences.en: Seismic stratigraphy - the study of stratigraphy and depositional facies as interpreted from seismic data.
sentences.cn: 地震地层学-- 按照地震资料解释进行地层学和沉积相的研究。

sentences.en: Seismic stratigraphy is the study of stratigraphy and depositional facies as interpreted from seismic data .
sentences.cn: 地震地层学是按照地震资料解释进行地层学和沉积相的研究。

sentences.en: STRATIGRAPHY AND GEOCHEMISTRY OF AN EARLY CAMPANIAN DEEPENING SUCCESSION ( BIBERECK FORMATION , GOSAU GROUP , AUSTRIA )

sentences.en: Stratigraphy is one of the basic subjects of most significance in geology.
sentences.cn: 地层学是地质学的一门重要的基础学科.

sentences.en: Stratigraphy studies the sequence of the rocks in the earth's crust.
sentences.cn: 地层学研究地壳中岩石的层序.

sentences.en: Stratigraphy traps can be classified into stratigraphic onlap trap and stratigraphic erosion unconformity trap.
sentences.cn: 地层圈闭可分为地层超覆不整合圈闭和地层削蚀不整合圈闭.

sentences.en: The sequence stratigraphy and tidal sedimentary systems is mainly discussed in Jiaozhou Bay area.
sentences.cn: 本文主要讨论了胶州湾及青岛前海层序地层和潮流沉积体系.

sentences.en: The strontium isotope stratigraphy (SIS) is predominantly used for correlation and dating of marine sediments.
sentences.cn: 锶同位素地层学在海相地层的对比和定年中具有十分重要的作用。

sentences.en: The theory of slope break is an advance of sequence stratigraphy applied in terrestrial basin.
sentences.cn: 坡折带理论是层序地层学在陆相盆地应用中的新发展.

sentences.en: Their main effort is directed to stratigraphy and structure of outcrops.
sentences.cn: 他们的主要精力放在研究天然露头的地层情况与构造上.

words.tran_cn: （组织的）层；[地质] 地层；社会阶层

trans.tran_en: the study of the composition, relative positions, etc, of rock strata in order to determine their geological history
